explanation: Freezing at this age gives you the 'Golden Standard' of eggs. Your genetics are pristine right now.
next_steps: We aim to bank 10-12 eggs. This gives you a >85% chance of a baby whenever you are ready in the future.
reassurance: You are locking in your fertility at its peak. Smartest investment for your future self.
call_to_action: Ready to start with your next period?

explanation: You are in the ideal window. Your AMH is likely good, meaning we can get many eggs in one cycle with mild stimulation.
next_steps: The process takes just 10-12 days of injections.
reassurance: It won't affect your natural fertility or deplete your reserve. We just rescue the eggs that would have died anyway this month.
call_to_action: Do you have questions about the timeline?

explanation: Aapki age ({{patient_age}}) perfect hai freezing ke liye. Is time eggs ki quality sabse best hoti hai.
next_steps: Bas 2 hafte ka process hai. Future mein jab bhi aap ready hongi, aapke paas 'Young Eggs' honge.
reassurance: Ye aapke career aur life goals ke liye ek insurance policy jaisa hai.
call_to_action: Let us know when you want to start.

explanation: You are still in a very good fertility window. We aim to banking about 15-20 eggs for maximum security.
next_steps: Depending on your AMH, we might need 1 or 2 cycles to reach that target.
reassurance: Freezing now stops the biological clock instantly.
call_to_action: Check your AMH report and call us.

explanation: At {{patient_age}}, egg quality is generally good, but we need volume. Statistically, we need about 15 eggs frozen to have a high probability of a live birth later.
next_steps: Let's start stimulation on Day 2.
reassurance: You are making a proactive choice before the decline starts accelerating at 37.

explanation: Abhi time sahi hai. 35 ke baad quality drop hona shuru hoti hai, isliye abhi freeze karna wise decision hai.
next_steps: Target: 15 eggs freeze karna.
reassurance: Isse aapko shaadi/career ke liye pressure feel nahi hoga.

explanation: At {{patient_age}}, we see a mix of normal and abnormal eggs. We likely need to bank 20+ eggs to find the golden ones later.
next_steps: You should mentally prepare for potentially 2 cycles of stimulation to gather enough eggs.
reassurance: It is not too late, but we need to be aggressive with the protocol now.
call_to_action: Are you comfortable with the multi-cycle plan?

explanation: Time is of the essence. Biology changes fast after 37.
next_steps: We recommend 'DuoStim' (Double Stimulation) - collecting eggs twice in one month to save time.
reassurance: This gives us the maximum yield in the shortest time.

explanation: Age factor thoda important hai abhi. Hume 2 baar cycle karni pad sakti hai taaki enough eggs milein.
next_steps: Jitna jaldi start karein utna behtar.
reassurance: Abhi bhi chances achhe hain agar hum number of eggs badha dein.

explanation: I want to be very honest. At {{patient_age}}, the chromosomal abnormality rate in eggs is high (>70%). Freezing eggs now has a limited success rate for the future.
next_steps: A better option might be 'Embryo Freezing' (if you have a partner) or considering donor eggs later.
reassurance: I will support whatever you choose, but I want you to know the statistics so you don't have false security.

explanation: If we proceed with egg freezing, we need a 'Banking Strategy' (3-4 cycles) to get 20 eggs.
next_steps: It is an expensive route. Alternative: Freezing embryos with donor sperm?
reassurance: We respect your desire to try with your own eggs.

explanation: 39+ mein egg quality issue rehta hai. Success rate freeze karne ke baad bhi 15-20% hi rehta hai.
next_steps: Agar aap financially ready hain multiple cycles ke liye, tabhi proceed karein.
reassurance: Decision aapka hai. Hum best protocol use karenge.

explanation: At age {{patient_age}}, egg freezing is medically not recommended. The chance of a live birth from eggs frozen at this age is <1%.
next_steps: I would be giving you false hope if I took your money for this. I strongly advise looking into Donor Eggs when you are ready to conceive.
reassurance: It is hard to hear, but your uterus can still carry a baby perfectly. The limit is only the egg.
call_to_action: I cannot approve an egg freezing cycle.

explanation: As discussed, we do not recommend oocyte cryopreservation at this age due to extremely low viability.
next_steps: We can discuss fertility preservation via other methods (Embryo creation with donor eggs) if desired.
reassurance: We prioritize your success over selling a cycle.
call_to_action: Let us know if you want a Donor Egg consult.

explanation: You have an excellent ovarian reserve! This puts you in the 'High Responder' category.
next_steps: We expect to retrieve 15-20 eggs in a single cycle.
reassurance: You likely only need one round of freezing to secure your future.

explanation: AMH {{amh_value}} hai jo bohot achha hai. Eggs ki sankhya (count) kaafi zyada hogi.
next_steps: Ek hi baar mein hum target achieve kar lenge.
reassurance: Aapka reserve strong hai.

explanation: Value: {{amh_value}}. Excellent reserve.
next_steps: High egg yield expected (15+).
reassurance: One cycle likely sufficient.

explanation: Your AMH is {{amh_value}}. This is normal fertility.
next_steps: We expect 8-12 eggs per cycle. Depending on your age, you might consider a second round to bank enough.
reassurance: Standard response expected.

explanation: Result {{amh_value}} hai. Hum 10-12 eggs expect kar rahe hain.
next_steps: Shayad 2 cycles lagenge agar hume 20 eggs chahiye safe side ke liye.
reassurance: Result average se achha hai.

explanation: AMH is {{amh_value}}, which is slightly low. It means fewer eggs per cycle (4-7 expected).
next_steps: Don't panic! It just means we need to 'pool' eggs over 2-3 cycles.
reassurance: Quality can still be good even if quantity is low.

explanation: With an AMH of {{amh_value}}, time is important. The reserve is dipping.
next_steps: I suggest starting immediately. We will use a special 'Antagonist' protocol to get every possible egg.
reassurance: We can absolutely still freeze, we just need to be aggressive.

explanation: Your AMH is {{amh_value}}. This indicates severely diminished reserve. We may only get 1-2 eggs per cycle.
next_steps: Egg freezing may not be cost-effective. Embryo freezing (with sperm) has a much higher survival rate.
reassurance: We can try, but I want to manage your expectations on the yield.
call_to_action: Let's discuss if this investment makes sense for you.

explanation: AMH is very low ({{amh_value}}). Freezing unfertilized eggs is risky as many don't survive thaw.
next_steps: Recommendation: Create embryos if possible (Partner or Donor Sperm).
reassurance: Embryos are much tougher than eggs.

explanation: Because you have PCOS (High AMH), we will get MANY eggs (20+).
next_steps: BUT, quality can be an issue. We need to use a specific trigger (Decapeptyl) to avoid OHSS sickness.
reassurance: PCOS is actually an advantage for egg freezing - you get more eggs for your money!

explanation: Your ovaries are very active. We need to be careful not to overstimulate you.
next_steps: We will use lower dose injections.
reassurance: You are a 'Super Responder'. We will likely finish your banking in just one cycle.

explanation: PCOS ki wajah se eggs kaafi zyada milenge. Ye achhi baat hai freezing ke liye.
next_steps: Bas swelling (OHSS) ka dhyaan rakhna padega.
reassurance: Ek baar mein hi quota poora ho jayega.

explanation: We retrieved **{{total_eggs}} eggs** today! This is a phenomenal result.
next_steps: We will clean them and tell you how many are Mature (MII) and frozen tomorrow.
reassurance: You have likely secured your fertility in one go.

explanation: Total **{{total_eggs}} eggs** mile hain! Ye result expectations se bhi better hai.
next_steps: Kal final count batayenge.
reassurance: Mission accomplished!

explanation: Got {{total_eggs}} eggs. Excellent yield.
next_steps: Maturity report tomorrow.
reassurance: Rest now.

explanation: We collected **{{total_eggs}} eggs**. This is a solid number.
next_steps: Depending on how many are mature, you might be done, or consider a mini-cycle for 5 more.
reassurance: This gives you a >60% chance of a future baby.
call_to_action: Let's review the final frozen count tomorrow.

explanation: **{{total_eggs}} eggs** retrieve huye hain. Achha number hai.
next_steps: Agar aap 100% sure hona chahte hain toh shayad ek aur round kar sakte hain.
reassurance: Abhi ke liye ye kaafi safe backup hai.

explanation: We retrieved {{total_eggs}} eggs. It's a decent start, but lower than our ideal target of 15.
next_steps: I highly recommend a second cycle to 'pool' more eggs.
reassurance: Something is better than nothing! You have started the bank.

explanation: We got {{total_eggs}} eggs. For your age, this gives about a 30-40% chance of a baby.
next_steps: To get to 80%, we need to go again.
reassurance: The quality of these might be great, but numbers give us safety.

explanation: We only managed to retrieve {{total_eggs}} eggs. I know this is disappointing compared to the effort you put in.
next_steps: We need to analyze if it was a protocol issue (meds) or just low reserve.
reassurance: We can try a completely different approach next time, or you can choose to stop.
call_to_action: Come in for a review meeting.

explanation: The count was low ({{total_eggs}}). It happens sometimes.
next_steps: Dr. {{doctor_name}} wants to review your hormone levels.
reassurance: Don't lose heart. Even 2-3 eggs can sometimes be enough.

explanation: Sirf {{total_eggs}} eggs mile. Response weak tha.
next_steps: Hume dekhna padega ki next time kya change karein.
reassurance: Himmat mat haariye.

explanation: Out of {{total_eggs}} retrieved, **{{mature_eggs}} were MII (Mature)**.
next_steps: Only mature eggs can be frozen. So your official bank count is {{mature_eggs}}.
reassurance: This is a normal maturity rate (approx 80%).

explanation: Total {{total_eggs}} mein se **{{mature_eggs}} eggs mature (kaam ke)** nikle.
next_steps: Humne {{mature_eggs}} freeze kar diye hain liquid nitrogen mein.
reassurance: Ye number final hai.

explanation: Your eggs have been safely frozen for 1 year! The renewal fee is ‚Çπ{{renewal_fee}}.
next_steps: Please pay by {{due_date}} to ensure continued storage.
reassurance: Your eggs are safe and temperature monitored 24/7.

explanation: Annual maintenance fee due for your frozen eggs.
next_steps: Pay before {{due_date}}.
reassurance: Eggs are safe.

context: Ready to use your frozen eggs.
explanation:
Process: 
1. Thaw eggs. 
2. Fertilize with sperm (ICSI). 
3. Grow embryos. 
4. Transfer.
next_steps: We need sperm sample on Thaw Day.
reassurance: Your eggs are the same age as when you froze them!

explanation: You froze these 5 years ago. Even though you are {{patient_age}} now, your eggs are still 30!
next_steps: Success rates depend on the freezing age, not current age.
reassurance: This was a great decision you made back then.

context: Frozen eggs use karne ka plan.
explanation: Ab hum eggs ko thaw (pighlayenge) aur fertilize karenge.
next_steps: Process agle period se shuru hoga.
reassurance: Eggs ki quality waisi hi hai jaise 3 saal pehle thi.

explanation: Since you are now married, we will use your husband's sperm for ICSI.
next_steps: We need to test his sperm parameters first.
reassurance: This is a standard IVF process from here on.

explanation: Please bring {{partner_name}} for infectious disease testing before we thaw eggs.
next_steps: Mandatory by law.
reassurance: Standard procedure.

explanation: You want to use your frozen eggs with donor sperm. That is fantastic.
next_steps: Select a donor from our bank. We will thaw eggs and inject donor sperm.
reassurance: Many women do this. You are building your family on your terms.

explanation: Once you finalize the sperm donor, we can schedule the thaw.
next_steps: Browse profiles today.
reassurance: We verify all donors for genetic issues.

explanation: Apne frozen eggs ke saath donor sperm use karna hai?
next_steps: Donor final karein.
reassurance: Process simple hai.

explanation: We thawed {{thawed_eggs}} eggs. **{{survived_eggs}} survived ({{survival_rate}}%)**.
next_steps: This is a good survival rate (Global avg is 80-90%). ICSI is being done now.
reassurance: The survivors look healthy.

explanation: Eggs are fragile. We thawed 10, and 8 survived intact.
next_steps: We are injecting those 8 with sperm now.
reassurance: 8 is a good number to work with.

explanation: Out of {{survived_eggs}} eggs, **{{fertilized_count}} fertilized (2PN)**.
next_steps: We are growing them to Blastocysts.
reassurance: Your frozen eggs worked!

explanation: Frozen eggs ne sperm accept kar liya! {{fertilized_count}} embryos ban rahe hain.
next_steps: Abhi incubator mein hain.
reassurance: Sab normal hai.

explanation:
Day 0: Thaw & ICSI 
Day 1: Fertilization check 
Day 3: Early embryo 
Day 5: Blastocyst Transfer.
next_steps: Transfer is tentatively on {{transfer_date}}.
reassurance: Plan accordingly.

explanation: We need to sync your uterus to the embryo age.
next_steps: Start progesterone 5 days before transfer.
reassurance: Precise timing matches the frozen egg physiology.

explanation: From your frozen eggs, we created **{{blastocyst_count}} Blastocysts**.
next_steps: We will transfer one and freeze the rest (as embryos now).
reassurance: Proof that egg freezing works!

explanation: Created {{blastocyst_count}} embryos from frozen eggs.
next_steps: Transfer ready.
reassurance: Success.

explanation: Aapke purane frozen eggs se **{{blastocyst_count}} healthy embryos** ban gaye.
next_steps: Ab transfer karke pregnancy plan karenge.
reassurance: Aapka decision sahi tha freeze karne ka.
